item.description:
Don't have time to travel to see family? Prefer not to spend another day with colleagues from work? As your options and invites start to open up, consider joining us instead.

Join other transplants for a yummy day of food, fun, friendship, maybe even football? One of our members - Beth - has just bought a new home near Providence College and is very excited to open up her home (and her large basement kitchen and rec room) to all of us.

I hosted Thanksgiving at my place last year. With 5 newcomer friends, I can honestly say it was one of the best Thanksgiving days I have ever had - great conversation and Manny even washed while Matt dried all of the dishes.

I'll email those who rsvp closer to the event to give you directions and contact information.

p.s. She has two wonderful dogs.
item.name: Thanksgiving Potluck
